scripts.build: npm run donodemodulesstuff && npm run copyfilestodist && npm run removetemp
scripts.donodemodulesstuff: npm run copypackagejsontotemp && npm run installproductionnodemodules
scripts.copyfilestodist: shx cp -r ./src/web/ ./dist && shx cp -r ./temp/node_modules/ ./dist/node_modules/ && shx rm -rf ./dist/web
